Uses of Class
com.parkingtycoon.controllers.UpdatableController

  • Packages that use UpdatableController 
    Package Description
    com.parkingtycoon.controllers  
    com.parkingtycoon.controllers.ui  

    • Uses of UpdatableController in com.parkingtycoon.controllers

      Subclasses of UpdatableController in com.parkingtycoon.controllers 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AnimatedSpritesController
      This class is responsible for loading Animated Sprite Data from JSON files to usable AnimatedSpriteModels.
      class  BluePrintsController
      The responsibility of this controller is to build and demolish buildings using the information of the BluePrints and the input of the player.
      class  CarQueuesController
      This class is responsible for adding and sending cars to an appropriate queue.
      class  CarsController
      This class is responsible for controlling the Cars in the simulation.
      class  ElevatorsController
      This controller is responsible for processing cars through elevators.
      class  EntrancesController
      This class is responsible for providing a Queue that processes the new Cars that would like to park.
      class  ExitsController
      This class is responsible for providing a Queue that processes the Cars that would like to leave the park.
      class  FloorsController
      This class is responsible for providing multiple floors of te simulation world.
      class  PathFollowersController<T extends PathFollowerModel>
      This class is responsible for making PathFollowers follow a path, using goals and elevators.
      class  TimeController
      This Class is responsible for enabling Controllers to be called every time when a amount of in game time has passes.
